001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.commands.metapath;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitCode;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.ExitStatus;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.AbstractTerminalCommand;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ICommandExecutor;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionService;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
017
018import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
019import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
020import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
021
022import java.util.ArrayList;
023import java.util.Collections;
024import java.util.Comparator;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.stream.Collectors;
028
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
030
031public class ListFunctionsSubcommand
032    extends AbstractTerminalCommand {
033  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(ListFunctionsSubcommand.class);
034
035  @NonNull
036  private static final String COMMAND = "list-functions";
037
038  @Override
039  public String getName() {
040    return COMMAND;
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public String getDescription() {
045    return "Get a listing of supported Metapath functions";
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public ICommandExecutor newExecutor(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine cmdLine) {
050    return ICommandExecutor.using(callingContext, cmdLine, this::executeCommand);
051  }
052
053  @SuppressWarnings({
054      "PMD.OnlyOneReturn", // readability
055      "unused"
056  })
057  protected ExitStatus executeCommand(
058      @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
059      @NonNull CommandLine cmdLine) {
060
061    Map<String, Map<String, List<IFunction>>> namespaceToNameToFunctionMap = FunctionService.getInstance().stream()
062        .collect(Collectors.groupingBy(
063            function -> function.getQName().getNamespaceURI(),
064            Collectors.groupingBy(
065                IFunction::getName,
066                Collectors.toList())));
067
068    Map<String, String> namespaceToPrefixMap = StaticContext.getWellKnownNamespacesMap().entrySet().stream()
069        .collect(Collectors.toMap(entry -> entry.getValue().toASCIIString(), Map.Entry::getKey));
070
071    List<String> namespaces = new ArrayList<>(namespaceToNameToFunctionMap.keySet());
072
073    Collections.sort(namespaces);
074
075    for (String namespace : namespaces) {
076      String prefix = namespaceToPrefixMap.get(namespace);
077
078      if (prefix == null) {
079        LOGGER.atInfo().log("In namespace '{}':", namespace);
080      } else {
081        LOGGER.atInfo().log("In namespace '{}' as '{}':", namespace, prefix);
082      }
083
084      Map<String, List<IFunction>> namespacedFunctions = namespaceToNameToFunctionMap.get(namespace);
085
086      List<String> names = new ArrayList<>(namespacedFunctions.keySet());
087      Collections.sort(names);
088
089      for (String name : names) {
090        List<IFunction> functions = namespacedFunctions.get(name);
091        Collections.sort(functions, Comparator.comparing(IFunction::arity));
092
093        for (IFunction function : functions) {
094          String functionRef = prefix == null
095              ? String.format("Q{%s}%s", function.getQName().getNamespaceURI(), function.getName())
096              : String.format("%s:%s", prefix, function.getName());
097
098          LOGGER.atInfo().log(String.format("%s(%s) as %s",
099              functionRef,
100              function.getArguments().isEmpty()
101                  ? ""
102                  : function.getArguments().stream().map(IArgument::toSignature)
103                      .collect(Collectors.joining(","))
104                      + (function.isArityUnbounded() ? ", ..." : ""),
105              function.getResult().toSignature()));
106        }
107      }
108    }
109    return ExitCode.OK.exit();
110  }
111}
